mapper.select: SELECT BPIP.FCST_YAM, BPIP.SEQ ,BPIP.PROD_DST_CD, PROD.PROD_DST_CD_NM ,BPIP.PROD_TYPE_CD, PROD_TYPE.PROD_TYPE_CD_NM ,BPIP.GODS_CLSF_CD, GODS.GODS_CLSF_CD_NM ,BPIP.SELL_AMT ,BPIP.BUY_AMT FROM BPIP020T BPIP, (SELECT SORT_SEQC AS PROD_SEQC, C10.COM_CD PROD_DST_CD, C10.COM_CD_NM PROD_DST_CD_NM FROM ACOM020T C20, ACOM010T C10 WHERE C20.CLMN_NM = 'PROD_DST_CD' AND C20.COM_GRP_CD = C10.COM_GRP_CD AND C10.USE_YN = 'Y' ) PROD, (SELECT SORT_SEQC AS PROD_TYPE_SEQC, C10.COM_CD PROD_TYPE_CD, C10.COM_CD_NM PROD_TYPE_CD_NM FROM ACOM020T C20, ACOM010T C10 WHERE C20.CLMN_NM = 'PROD_TYPE_CD' AND C20.COM_GRP_CD = C10.COM_GRP_CD AND C10.USE_YN = 'Y' ) PROD_TYPE, (SELECT SORT_SEQC AS GODS_SEQC, C10.COM_CD GODS_CLSF_CD, C10.COM_CD_NM GODS_CLSF_CD_NM FROM ACOM020T C20, ACOM010T C10 WHERE C20.CLMN_NM = 'GODS_CLSF_CD' AND C20.COM_GRP_CD = C10.COM_GRP_CD AND C10.USE_YN = 'Y' ) GODS WHERE BPIP.PROD_DST_CD = PROD.PROD_DST_CD AND BPIP.PROD_TYPE_CD = PROD_TYPE.PROD_TYPE_CD AND BPIP.GODS_CLSF_CD = GODS.GODS_CLSF_CD AND BPIP.BOPT_ID = UPPER(#{boptId}) ORDER BY FCST_YAM DESC, PROD_SEQC, GODS_SEQC

SELECT BPIP.BEXC_ROLE_CD, ROLE.BEXC_ROLE_CD_NM, BPIP.PUT_NOP_COUNT, BPIP.RMRK_CONT FROM BPIP030T BPIP, (SELECT SORT_SEQC AS ROLE_SEQC, C10.COM_CD BEXC_ROLE_CD, C10.COM_CD_NM BEXC_ROLE_CD_NM FROM ACOM020T C20, ACOM010T C10 WHERE C20.CLMN_NM = 'BEXC_ROLE_CD' AND C20.COM_GRP_CD = C10.COM_GRP_CD ) ROLE WHERE BPIP.BEXC_ROLE_CD = ROLE.BEXC_ROLE_CD AND BPIP.BOPT_ID = UPPER(#{boptId}) ORDER BY ROLE_SEQC

SELECT IBIZ_CUST_NM(BPIP.ORDE_CUST_ID) AS ORDE_CUST_NM, HMST.SLS_DEPT_NM, HMST.EMP_ID, HMST.SLS_EMP_NM, IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('BSNS_CLSF_CD',BPIP.BSNS_CLSF_CD) AS BSNS_CLSF_CD_NM, IBIZ_EMP_NM(BPIP.REG_EMP_ID) AS REG_EMP_NM, ( SELECT DEPT_NM FROM HMST100T WHERE DEPT_ID = ( SELECT BLTO_DEPT_ID FROM HMST300T WHERE EMP_ID = BPIP.REG_EMP_ID ) ) AS REG_DEPT_NM, IBIZ_EMP_NM(BPIP.CHG_EMP_ID) AS CHG_EMP_NM, ( SELECT DEPT_NM FROM HMST100T WHERE DEPT_ID = ( SELECT BLTO_DEPT_ID FROM HMST300T WHERE EMP_ID = BPIP.CHG_EMP_ID ) ) AS CHG_DEPT_NM, IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('PRJT_TYPE_CD',APRJ.PRJT_TYPE_CD) as PRJT_TYPE_CD_NM, IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('PRJT_STAT_CD',APRJ.PRJT_STAT_CD) as PRJT_STAT_CD_NM, IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('BOPT_STAT_CD',BPIP.BOPT_STAT_CD) as BOPT_STAT_CD_NM, IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('BOPT_END_TYPE_CD',BPIP.BOPT_END_TYPE_CD) as BOPT_END_TYPE_CD_NM, IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('WCT_PRBB_CD',BPIP.WCT_PRBB_CD) as WCT_PRBB_CD_NM, BPIP.BOPT_ID, BPIP.PRJT_ID, BPIP.BOPT_NM, BPIP.ORDE_CUST_ID, BPIP.BSNS_CLSF_CD, BPIP.CNTR_DATE, BPIP.CNTR_TRSF_START_YAM, BPIP.CNTR_TRSF_END_YAM, BPIP.PRPS_FNSH_DATE, BPIP.BID_FNSH_DATE, BPIP.CMPY_SLCT_DATE, BPIP.WCT_PRBB_CD, BPIP.FCST_RFLC_YN, BPIP.DTIM_RPRT_DISP_YN, BPIP.WCT_DCD_DATE, BPIP.BOPT_STAT_CD, BPIP.BOPT_END_TYPE_CD, BPIP.SLS_DEPT_ID, BPIP.SLS_EMP_ID, BPIP.SPCL_CONT, BPIP.REG_EMP_ID, BPIP.REG_DT, BPIP.CHG_EMP_ID, BPIP.CHG_DT FROM BPIP000T BPIP LEFT JOIN ( SELECT HMST1.DEPT_NM AS SLS_DEPT_NM, HMST3.EMP_ID, HMST3.EMP_NM AS SLS_EMP_NM FROM HMST300T HMST3 JOIN HMST100T HMST1 ON HMST3.BLTO_DEPT_ID = HMST1.DEPT_ID ) HMST ON BPIP.SLS_EMP_ID = HMST.EMP_ID JOIN APRJ000T APRJ ON BPIP.PRJT_ID = APRJ.PRJT_ID WHERE 1 = 1
AND BOPT_ID = UPPER(#{boptId})

SELECT bpip.BOPT_ID, bpip.BOPT_NM, bpip.PRJT_ID, bpip.SLS_DEPT_ID, T1.LAST_CUST_ID, IBIZ_CUST_NM(T1.LAST_CUST_ID) AS LAST_CUST_NM, bpip.ORDE_CUST_ID, IBIZ_CUST_NM(bpip.ORDE_CUST_ID) AS ORDE_CUST_NM, IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('BSNS_CLSF_CD',bpip.BSNS_CLSF_CD) AS BSNS_CLSF_CD_NM, bpip.CNTR_DATE, bpip.FCST_RFLC_YN, ( SELECT SUM(SELL_AMT) FROM BPIP020T WHERE BOPT_ID = bpip.BOPT_ID ) AS SUM_SELL_AMT, IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('WCT_PRBB_CD',bpip.WCT_PRBB_CD) as WCT_PRBB_CD_NM, hmst.SLS_DEPT_NM, hmst.EMP_ID, hmst.SLS_EMP_NM, IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('BOPT_STAT_CD',bpip.BOPT_STAT_CD) as BOPT_STAT_CD_NM FROM BPIP000T bpip JOIN APRJ000T T1 ON bpip.PRJT_ID = T1.PRJT_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT hmst1.DEPT_NM AS SLS_DEPT_NM, hmst3.EMP_ID, hmst3.EMP_NM AS SLS_EMP_NM FROM HMST300T hmst3 JOIN HMST100T hmst1 ON hmst3.BLTO_DEPT_ID = hmst1.DEPT_ID ) hmst ON bpip.SLS_EMP_ID = hmst.EMP_ID
,(SELECT DISTINCT DEPT_ID, HGRK_DEPT_ID FROM HMST100T T2 START WITH T2.DEPT_ID IN (SELECT AUTH_DEPT_ID FROM SSYS252T WHERE USER_ID = #{slsEmpId}) CONNECT BY (PRIOR T2.DEPT_ID = T2.HGRK_DEPT_ID) ) T3
WHERE 1 = 1 AND bpip.BOPT_STAT_CD != 'D1'
AND bpip.PRJT_ID = UPPER(#{prjtId})
AND bpip.BOPT_ID != UPPER(#{boptId})
AND (bpip.SLS_DEPT_ID IN T3.DEPT_ID OR bpip.SLS_DEPT_ID IN T3.HGRK_DEPT_ID)
ORDER BY CNTR_DATE desc

SELECT CASE WHEN ( SELECT DISTINCT PRJT_TYPE_CD FROM BPIP000T BPIP INNER JOIN BEST000T BEST ON BPIP.BOPT_ID = BEST.BOPT_ID AND BPIP.BOPT_ID = UPPER(#{boptId}) ) IS NULL THEN (SELECT APRJ.PRJT_TYPE_CD FROM BPIP000T BPIP, APRJ000T APRJ WHERE BPIP.PRJT_ID = APRJ.PRJT_ID AND BOPT_ID = UPPER(#{boptId}) ) ELSE ( SELECT DISTINCT PRJT_TYPE_CD FROM BPIP000T BPIP INNER JOIN BEST000T BEST ON BPIP.BOPT_ID = BEST.BOPT_ID AND BPIP.BOPT_ID = UPPER(#{boptId}) ) END AS PRJT_TYPE_CD FROM DUAL

SELECT T1.FCST_PAL_ID, T1.SANT_ID, T1.DOC_NO, T1.BOPT_ID, T1.ORDE_CUST_ID, IBIZ_CUST_NM(T1.ORDE_CUST_ID) AS ORDE_CUST_NM, T1.PRJT_TYPE_CD, T1.SLS_EMP_ID, IBIZ_EMP_NM(T1.SLS_EMP_ID) AS SLS_EMP_NM, T1.REG_DT, IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('FCST_PAL_PRGS_STAT_CD',FCST_PAL_PRGS_STAT_CD) AS FCST_PAL_PRGS_STAT_CD_NM, T2.SUM_SELL_AMT, T2.SUM_BUY_AMT, T2.CTMG_AMT, T2.SUM_PUT_NOP_COUNT FROM BEST000T T1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT FCST_PAL_ID, NVL(SUM(SELL_AMT), 0) AS SUM_SELL_AMT, NVL(SUM(BUY_COST_AMT), 0) AS SUM_BUY_AMT, (NVL(SUM(SELL_AMT),0) - NVL(SUM(BUY_COST_AMT),0) - NVL(SUM(DRCST_AMT),0) - NVL(SUM(DREXP_AMT),0) - NVL(SUM(INCST_AMT),0)) AS CTMG_AMT, NVL(SUM(PUT_NOP_COUNT), 0) AS SUM_PUT_NOP_COUNT FROM BEST020T GROUP BY FCST_PAL_ID ) T2 ON T1.FCST_PAL_ID = T2.FCST_PAL_ID WHERE T1.BOPT_ID = UPPER(#{boptId}) ORDER BY T1.REG_DT

SELECT T1.FCST_PAL_ID, T1.SANT_ID, T1.DOC_NO, T1.BOPT_ID, T1.ORDE_CUST_ID, IBIZ_CUST_NM(T1.ORDE_CUST_ID) AS ORDE_CUST_NM, T1.PRJT_TYPE_CD, T1.SLS_EMP_ID, IBIZ_EMP_NM(T1.SLS_EMP_ID) AS SLS_EMP_NM, T1.REG_DT, IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('FCST_PAL_PRGS_STAT_CD',FCST_PAL_PRGS_STAT_CD) AS FCST_PAL_PRGS_STAT_CD_NM, T2.SUM_SELL_AMT, T2.SUM_BUY_AMT, T2.CTMG_AMT FROM BEST000T T1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT FCST_PAL_ID, NVL(SUM(SELL_AMT), 0) AS SUM_SELL_AMT, NVL(SUM(BUY_COST_AMT), 0) AS SUM_BUY_AMT, NVL(SUM(CTMG_AMT), 0) AS CTMG_AMT FROM BEST020T GROUP BY FCST_PAL_ID )T2 ON T1.FCST_PAL_ID = T2.FCST_PAL_ID WHERE T1.BOPT_ID = UPPER(#{boptId}) ORDER BY T1.REG_DT
SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(BOPT_ID) IS NOT NULL THEN MAX(BOPT_ID) ELSE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy') || '000000' END AS BOPT_ID FROM BPIP000T

SELECT T1.PRJT_ID ,T1.BOPT_ID ,T1.BOPT_NM ,T3.LAST_CUST_ID ,T3.LAST_CUST_NM ,T3.PRJT_NM ,T3.BSNS_BDGT_AMT ,( SELECT SUM(SELL_AMT) FROM BPIP020T WHERE BOPT_ID = T1.BOPT_ID ) AS SUM_SELL_AMT ,IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('BSNS_CLSF_CD',T1.BSNS_CLSF_CD) BSNS_CLSF_CD_NM ,T1.ORDE_CUST_ID ,IBIZ_CUST_NM(T1.ORDE_CUST_ID) AS ORDE_CUST_NM ,T3.PRJT_TYPE_CD ,IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('PRJT_TYPE_CD',T3.PRJT_TYPE_CD) AS PRJT_TYPE_CD_NM ,IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('BSNS_DOI_CD',T3.BSNS_DOI_CD) AS BSNS_DOI_NM ,T1.CNTR_DATE ,T1.CNTR_TRSF_START_YAM ,T1.CNTR_TRSF_END_YAM ,T1.PRPS_FNSH_DATE ,T1.BID_FNSH_DATE ,T1.CMPY_SLCT_DATE ,T1.WCT_DCD_DATE ,IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('BOPT_END_TYPE_CD',T1.BOPT_END_TYPE_CD) AS BOPT_END_TYPE_CD_NM ,T1.WCT_PRBB_CD ,IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('WCT_PRBB_CD',T1.WCT_PRBB_CD) AS WCT_PRBB_CD_NM ,T1.SLS_DEPT_ID ,IBIZ_DEPT_NM(T1.SLS_DEPT_ID ) AS SLS_DEPT_NM ,T1.SLS_EMP_ID ,IBIZ_EMP_NM(T1.SLS_EMP_ID) AS SLS_EMP_NM ,T3.PRJT_STAT_CD ,IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('PRJT_STAT_CD',T3.PRJT_STAT_CD) AS PRJT_STAT_CD_NM ,T1.BOPT_STAT_CD ,IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('BOPT_STAT_CD',T1.BOPT_STAT_CD) AS BOPT_STAT_CD_NM ,T1.FCST_RFLC_YN ,T1.REG_DT ,T1.CHG_DT ,IBIZ_EMP_NM(T1.REG_EMP_ID) REG_EMP_NM ,IBIZ_EMP_NM(T1.CHG_EMP_ID) CHG_EMP_NM , T4.FCST_YAM , IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('PROD_DST_CD',T4.PROD_DST_CD) PROD_DST_CD_NM , IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('PROD_TYPE_CD',T4.PROD_TYPE_CD) PROD_TYPE_CD_NM , IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('GODS_CLSF_CD',T4.GODS_CLSF_CD) GODS_CLSF_CD_NM , T4.SELL_AMT , T4.BUY_AMT , WCT_PRBB_WGVL*T4.SELL_AMT FCST_SELL_AMT , WCT_PRBB_WGVL*T4.BUY_AMT FCST_BUY_AMT , WCT_PRBB_WGVL , COM_CD_NUM_VAL FROM BPIP000T T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN(SELECT PRJT_ID, PRJT_NM ,PRJT_TYPE_CD,PRJT_STAT_CD ,LAST_CUST_ID,BSNS_BDGT_AMT,BSNS_DOI_CD ,IBIZ_CUST_NM(LAST_CUST_ID) AS LAST_CUST_NM FROM APRJ000T ) T3 ON T1.PRJT_ID = T3.PRJT_ID JOIN(SELECT DISTINCT A.BOPT_ID, A.FCST_YAM, A.PROD_DST_CD, A.PROD_TYPE_CD, A.GODS_CLSF_CD, A.SELL_AMT, A.BUY_AMT FROM BPIP020T A, (SELECT BOPT_ID FROM BPIP020T WHERE 1=1
AND (SUBSTR(#{buyStartDate},0,6) <= FCST_YAM AND BUY_AMT != 0)
AND (SUBSTR(#{buyEndDate},0,6) >= FCST_YAM AND BUY_AMT != 0)
AND (SUBSTR(#{sellStartDate},0,6) <= FCST_YAM AND SELL_AMT != 0)
AND (SUBSTR(#{sellEndDate},0,6) >= FCST_YAM AND SELL_AMT != 0)
) B WHERE 1=1 AND A.BOPT_ID = B.BOPT_ID ) T4 ON T1.BOPT_ID = T4.BOPT_ID JOIN(SELECT COM_CD WCT_PRBB_CD,COM_CD_NUM_VAL, COM_CD_NUM_VAL WCT_PRBB_WGVL FROM ACOM010T WHERE COM_GRP_CD = ( SELECT COM_GRP_CD FROM ACOM020T WHERE CLMN_NM = 'WCT_PRBB_CD' ) ) T5 ON T1.WCT_PRBB_CD = T5.WCT_PRBB_CD WHERE 1=1 AND T1.BOPT_STAT_CD != 'D1'
AND T1.PRJT_ID = UPPER(#{prjtId})
AND UPPER(T3.PRJT_NM) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{prjtNm})||'%'
AND UPPER(T3.LAST_CUST_ID) = UPPER(#{lastCustId})
AND UPPER(LAST_CUST_NM) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{lastCustNm})||'%'
AND T1.BOPT_ID = UPPER(#{boptId})
AND UPPER(T1.BOPT_NM) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{boptNm})||'%'
AND SLS_DEPT_ID IN ( SELECT DEPT_ID FROM HMST100T START WITH DEPT_ID = #{slsDeptId} CONNECT BY PRIOR DEPT_ID = HGRK_DEPT_ID )
AND T1.SLS_Emp_ID = #{slsEmpId}
AND T3.PRJT_STAT_CD = #{prjtStatCd}
AND T1.BOPT_STAT_CD = #{boptStatCd}
AND PRJT_TYPE_CD = #{prjtTypeCd}
AND WCT_PRBB_CD = #{wctPrbbCd}
AND FCST_RFLC_YN = #{fcstRflcYn}
AND BSNS_CLSF_CD = #{bsnsClsfCd}
AND #{cntrStartDate} <= T1.CNTR_DATE
AND #{cntrEndDate} >= T1.CNTR_DATE
AND BOPT_STAT_CD != 'E'
ORDER BY LAST_CUST_NM ASC , BOPT_NM ASC, FCST_YAM DESC
ORDER BY CNTR_DATE ASC , LAST_CUST_NM ASC , BOPT_NM ASC, FCST_YAM DESC
ORDER BY NVL(SUM_SELL_AMT,0) DESC , LAST_CUST_NM ASC , BOPT_NM ASC, FCST_YAM DESC
ORDER BY COM_CD_NUM_VAL DESC, CNTR_DATE, LAST_CUST_NM ASC , BOPT_NM ASC, FCST_YAM DESC
ORDER BY LAST_CUST_NM ASC , BOPT_NM ASC, FCST_YAM DESC

SELECT TT.PRJT_ID, TT.BOPT_ID, TT.BOPT_NM, TT.LAST_CUST_ID, TT.LAST_CUST_NM , TT.PRJT_NM, TT.BSNS_BDGT_AMT, TT.BSNS_CLSF_CD_NM, TT.ORDE_CUST_ID, TT.ORDE_CUST_NM , TT.PRJT_TYPE_CD, TT.PRJT_TYPE_CD_NM, TT.BSNS_DOI_NM, TT.CNTR_DATE , TT.CNTR_TRSF_START_YAM, TT.CNTR_TRSF_END_YAM, TT.PRPS_FNSH_DATE , TT.BID_FNSH_DATE, TT.CMPY_SLCT_DATE, TT.WCT_DCD_DATE, TT.BOPT_END_TYPE_CD_NM , TT.SUM_SELL_AMT, TT.SUM_BUY_AMT, TT.SUM_PUT_NOP_COUNT , TT.WCT_PRBB_CD, TT.WCT_PRBB_CD_NM, TT.SLS_DEPT_ID, TT.SLS_DEPT_NM , TT.SLS_EMP_ID, TT.SLS_EMP_NM, TT.PRJT_STAT_CD, TT.PRJT_STAT_CD_NM , TT.BOPT_STAT_CD, TT.BOPT_STAT_CD_NM, TT.FCST_RFLC_YN, TT.REG_DT , TT.CHG_DT, TT.REG_EMP_NM, TT.CHG_EMP_NM, TT.WCT_PRBB_WGVL, TT.COM_CD_NUM_VAL , WCT_PRBB_WGVL* SUM_SELL_AMT FCST_SELL_AMT , WCT_PRBB_WGVL* SUM_BUY_AMT FCST_BUY_AMT FROM ( SELECT T1.PRJT_ID ,T1.BOPT_ID ,T1.BOPT_NM ,T3.LAST_CUST_ID ,T3.LAST_CUST_NM ,T3.PRJT_NM ,T3.BSNS_BDGT_AMT ,IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('BSNS_CLSF_CD',T1.BSNS_CLSF_CD) BSNS_CLSF_CD_NM ,T1.ORDE_CUST_ID ,IBIZ_CUST_NM(T1.ORDE_CUST_ID) AS ORDE_CUST_NM ,T3.PRJT_TYPE_CD ,IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('PRJT_TYPE_CD',T3.PRJT_TYPE_CD) AS PRJT_TYPE_CD_NM ,IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('BSNS_DOI_CD',T3.BSNS_DOI_CD) AS BSNS_DOI_NM ,T1.CNTR_DATE ,T1.CNTR_TRSF_START_YAM ,T1.CNTR_TRSF_END_YAM ,T1.PRPS_FNSH_DATE ,T1.BID_FNSH_DATE ,T1.CMPY_SLCT_DATE ,T1.WCT_DCD_DATE ,IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('BOPT_END_TYPE_CD',T1.BOPT_END_TYPE_CD) AS BOPT_END_TYPE_CD_NM ,( SELECT SUM(SELL_AMT) FROM BPIP020T WHERE BOPT_ID = T1.BOPT_ID ) AS SUM_SELL_AMT ,( SELECT SUM(BUY_AMT) FROM BPIP020T WHERE BOPT_ID = T1.BOPT_ID ) AS SUM_BUY_AMT ,( SELECT SUM(PUT_NOP_COUNT) FROM BPIP030T WHERE BOPT_ID = T1.BOPT_ID ) AS SUM_PUT_NOP_COUNT ,T1.WCT_PRBB_CD ,IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('WCT_PRBB_CD',T1.WCT_PRBB_CD) AS WCT_PRBB_CD_NM ,T1.SLS_DEPT_ID ,IBIZ_DEPT_NM(T1.SLS_DEPT_ID) AS SLS_DEPT_NM ,T1.SLS_EMP_ID ,IBIZ_EMP_NM(T1.SLS_EMP_ID) AS SLS_EMP_NM ,T3.PRJT_STAT_CD ,IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('PRJT_STAT_CD',T3.PRJT_STAT_CD) AS PRJT_STAT_CD_NM ,T1.BOPT_STAT_CD ,IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('BOPT_STAT_CD',T1.BOPT_STAT_CD) AS BOPT_STAT_CD_NM ,T1.FCST_RFLC_YN ,T1.REG_DT ,T1.CHG_DT ,IBIZ_EMP_NM(T1.REG_EMP_ID) AS REG_EMP_NM ,IBIZ_EMP_NM(T1.CHG_EMP_ID) AS CHG_EMP_NM , ( SELECT COM_CD_NUM_VAL FROM ACOM010T WHERE COM_GRP_CD = ( SELECT COM_GRP_CD FROM ACOM020T WHERE CLMN_NM = 'WCT_PRBB_CD' ) AND COM_CD = T1.WCT_PRBB_CD ) WCT_PRBB_WGVL , COM_CD_NUM_VAL FROM BPIP000T T1 JOIN ACOM010T T2 ON (T1.WCT_PRBB_CD = T2.COM_CD AND T2.COM_GRP_CD = (SELECT COM_GRP_CD FROM ACOM020T WHERE CLMN_NM = 'WCT_PRBB_CD') )-- 수주확률코드 ) JOIN( SELECT PRJT_ID ,PRJT_NM ,PRJT_TYPE_CD ,PRJT_STAT_CD ,LAST_CUST_ID ,BSNS_BDGT_AMT ,BSNS_DOI_CD ,( SELECT CUST_NM FROM CMST000T WHERE CUST_ID = LAST_CUST_ID ) AS LAST_CUST_NM FROM APRJ000T ) T3 ON T1.PRJT_ID = T3.PRJT_ID
INNER JOIN ( SELECT BOPT_ID FROM BPIP020T WHERE 1 = 1
AND (SUBSTR(#{buyStartDate},0,6) <= FCST_YAM AND BUY_AMT != 0)
AND (SUBSTR(#{buyEndDate},0,6) >= FCST_YAM AND BUY_AMT != 0)
AND (SUBSTR(#{sellStartDate},0,6) <= FCST_YAM AND SELL_AMT != 0)
AND (SUBSTR(#{sellEndDate},0,6) >= FCST_YAM AND SELL_AMT != 0 )
GROUP BY BOPT_ID )T6 ON T6.BOPT_ID = T1.BOPT_ID
WHERE 1=1 AND T1.BOPT_STAT_CD != 'D1'
AND T1.PRJT_ID = UPPER(#{prjtId})
AND UPPER(T3.PRJT_NM) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{prjtNm})||'%'
AND UPPER(T3.LAST_CUST_ID) = UPPER(#{lastCustId})
AND UPPER(LAST_CUST_NM) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{lastCustNm})||'%'
AND T1.BOPT_ID = UPPER(#{boptId})
AND UPPER(T1.BOPT_NM) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{boptNm})||'%'
AND SLS_DEPT_ID IN ( SELECT DEPT_ID FROM HMST100T START WITH DEPT_ID = #{slsDeptId} CONNECT BY PRIOR DEPT_ID = HGRK_DEPT_ID )
AND T1.SLS_Emp_ID = #{slsEmpId}
AND T3.PRJT_STAT_CD = #{prjtStatCd}
AND T1.BOPT_STAT_CD = #{boptStatCd}
AND PRJT_TYPE_CD = #{prjtTypeCd}
AND WCT_PRBB_CD = #{wctPrbbCd}
AND FCST_RFLC_YN = #{fcstRflcYn}
AND BSNS_CLSF_CD = #{bsnsClsfCd}
AND #{cntrStartDate} <= T1.CNTR_DATE
AND #{cntrEndDate} >= T1.CNTR_DATE
AND BOPT_STAT_CD != 'E'
)TT
ORDER BY IBIZ_CUST_NM(LAST_CUST_ID) ASC , BOPT_NM ASC, CNTR_DATE ASC
ORDER BY CNTR_DATE ASC, IBIZ_CUST_NM(LAST_CUST_ID) ASC , BOPT_NM ASC
ORDER BY NVL(SUM_SELL_AMT,0) DESC , IBIZ_CUST_NM(LAST_CUST_ID) ASC , BOPT_NM ASC
ORDER BY COM_CD_NUM_VAL DESC, CNTR_DATE, IBIZ_CUST_NM(LAST_CUST_ID) ASC , BOPT_NM ASC
ORDER BY IBIZ_CUST_NM(LAST_CUST_ID) ASC , BOPT_NM ASC, CNTR_DATE ASC

INSERT INTO BPIP000T ( BOPT_ID, PRJT_ID, BOPT_NM, BSNS_CLSF_CD,
ORDE_CUST_ID,
CNTR_DATE,
CNTR_TRSF_START_YAM,
CNTR_TRSF_END_YAM,
PRPS_FNSH_DATE,
BID_FNSH_DATE,
CMPY_SLCT_DATE,
WCT_PRBB_CD, FCST_RFLC_YN,
DTIM_RPRT_DISP_YN,
WCT_DCD_DATE,
BOPT_STAT_CD, BOPT_END_TYPE_CD, SLS_DEPT_ID, SLS_EMP_ID,
SPCL_CONT,
REG_EMP_ID, REG_DT, CHG_EMP_ID, CHG_DT ) VALUES ( #{boptId}, #{prjtId}, #{boptNm}, #{bsnsClsfCd},
#{ordeCustId},
#{cntrDate},
#{cntrTrsfStartYam},
#{cntrTrsfEndYam},
#{prpsFnshDate},
#{bidFnshDate},
#{cmpySlctDate},
#{wctPrbbCd}, #{fcstRflcYn},
#{dtimRprtDispYn},
#{wctDcdDate},
#{boptStatCd}, #{boptEndTypeCd}, #{slsDeptId}, #{slsEmpId},
